title: 2 killed, 2 injured in Bike-Tractor collision in Nankana
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 1 (APP): Two children were killed, while a man and a girl sustained serious injuries on Thursday when a motorcycle collided with a tractor in Nankana Sahib..
According to private news channel, a high-speed motorcycle collided with a tractor in the dark on Shahkot Road, as a result of the accident, six-year-old Abira and his four-year-old brother Ahmed died.
7-year-old Arha and her 45-year-old father Zulfikar were seriously injured in the accident.
According to rescue officials, the injured were shifted to District Headquarters Hospital.
